name: bedazzle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to impress someone very much, because of being very intelligent, beautiful, etc.: She had bedazzled him with her knowledge and beauty.
to make someone slightly confused, and not able to think clearly: The strange atmosphere in the room had bedazzled her.
